Noble Igwe (amụrụ Noble Chibuzor Igwe) bụ onye na-ede blọgụ Naijiria, nke a ma ama maka ịmalite usoro ntụrụndụ 360 Group tinyere Tonia Soares na Oye Akdeinde..
Igwe mụrụ ma zụlite na Aba, Abia steeti, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na National High School Aba
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na St Augustine's Anglican Seminary Nbawsi;  Federal Government College Okigwe wee gụchaa na University of Nigeria, Nsukka
O mechara gaa mahadum Pan Africa..
N'afọ 2009, Igwe malitere 360Nobs Limited.  N'April 2010, o wepụtara 360nobs tinyere Oye Akideinde na Abimbola Soares..

Na June 11, 2016, Igwe lụrụ Chioma Otisi.
Ha nabatara nwa mbụ ha na Jenụwarị 2017.
